description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPride of the Pack:
Your {RACE_Eft}s always have one of the following buffs for each {RACE_Eft} fighting on your side: {CONDNAME_BUFF_SAVAGE, {CONDNAME_BUFF_SPLASH}, {CONDNAME_BUFF_PROTECT}, {CONDNAME_BUFF_BERSERK}, {CONDNAME_BUFF_AGILE}, {CONDNAME_BUFF_WARD}. Buffs are prioritized in that order.
name: Bloody Skull
